title: [FEATURE] Binding Skottie
body: Hello, I see on Skia Official Docs there is an Lottie Animation Player, [Skottie](https://skia.org/user/modules/skottie), and I wanna use this feature, but I saw the SkiaSharp API and this doesn't exist, do you think implement this module some day? or never? if so I would like to know why.
